Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the sale of non-tobacco smoking products to minors and young adults, and to repeal subdivision f of section 17-713 and section 17-714 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the sale of herbal cigarettes to individuals under eighteen years of age
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the sale of non-tobacco smoking products to minors and young adults, and the sale of herbal cigarettes to individuals under 18 years of age.
